mapper.insert: insert into business_building_room(fee_coefficient, section, remark, user_id, room_id, layer, built_up_area, operate, room_num, unit_id, b_id, apartment, state, community_id, room_type, room_sub_type, room_rent, room_area) values (#{feeCoefficient}, #{section}, #{remark}, #{userId}, #{roomId}, #{layer}, #{builtUpArea}, #{operate}, #{roomNum}, #{unitId}, #{bId}, #{apartment}, #{state}, #{communityId}, #{roomType}, #{roomSubType}, #{roomRent}, #{roomArea})
